name: ICDPR2018 2018 : 2018 2ndInternational Conference on Data Processing and Robotics
content: ‚óèPublication and Indexing 1, All the papers will be peer reviewed by 2-3 experts. The review result comes out in 20-30 days. If the paper needs revising, the revised copy should be submitted again for peer review. All the accepted papers will be included in the conference proceeding, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, CPCI, Scopus, INSPEC and other academical databases.
organizers: Asia Pacific Institute of Science and Engineering
